name: Where's My Cargo?
description:
Where's My Cargo is a platformer game that you need to deliver the cargo before your energy runs out. There are obstacles you need to avoid to survive or your drone could crash! You take off from the platform to get your cargo and deliver it to the owner. After the delivery you have to go back to your original platform for the  next level without crashing. 

Deliver them fast,  deliver them carefully!
